sentence.Network_en: The species composition of mollusca were markedly difference in different sediment.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同底质的红树林区软体动物组成有显著差异.污染可能是造成沙头角红树林区软体动物多样性低的重要环境因子.

sentence.Network_en: Mollusca is the second biggest phylum in animal kingdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 软体动物是动物界仅次于节肢动物的第二大门类.

sentence.Network_en: Among 52 species of mollusca identified , 45 were gastropods, 7 were bivalves.
sentence.Network_cn: 调查期间采到的软体动物已鉴定52种,其中腹足类45种, 双壳类7种.
